claimXPFor(address,uint256,bytes).details: Uses oracle proof bound to the provided user. Anyone can call this; oracle proof prevents abuse.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.rewardAmounts: Array of reward amounts (must match thresholds length)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateERC20Reward(address).notice: Calculate total ERC20 reward for a user

claimERC20Rewards().notice: Claim ERC20 rewards for the configured token

claimXPFor(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Claim XP on behalf of a user (server-relayed flow)

emergencyWithdrawERC20(address,uint256).notice: // getAllAvailableERC20Rewards removed in single-token configuration /**Emergency function to withdraw stuck ERC20 tokens

getAvailableERC20Reward(address).notice: Get available ERC20 rewards for a user

getTotalXP(address).notice: Get total XP for a user

setERC20RewardConfig(address,uint256[],u.notice: Set ERC20 reward configuration with thresholds (single token)
